question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Kota Bogor, Endonezya neden "Yağmur Şehri" olarak bilinir?
answer: Kota Bogor, Endonezya, çok sık ve yoğun yağış aldığı için "Yağmur Şehri" olarak bilinir.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor, Indonesia, is known as the "Rain City" because it receives very frequent and heavy rainfall.
